# function to return polygon
def bbox(long0, lat0, lat1, long1):
    return Polygon([[long0, lat0],
                    [long1,lat0],
                    [long1,lat1],
                    [long0, lat1]])

bbox = bbox(300000, 50000, 150000, 400000)

gpd.GeoDataFrame(pd.DataFrame(['p1'], columns = ['geom']),
    crs = {'init': crs},
    geometry = [bbox]).to_file(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), '..', 'data', 'bbox.shp'))

print(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), '..', 'data', 'bbox.shp'))
